===Etymology===
{{compound|lang=zh|一|池|三|山|t1=[[one]]|t2=[[pond]]|t3=[[three]]|t4=[[mountain]]; [[hill]]|pos4=used for rocky islands}}. The use of {{zh-l|池}} instead of {{zh-l|湖|[[lake]]}} derives from the name of the original example, [[Taiye Pond]] ({{zh-l|太液池}}), at [[w:Wu of Han|Emperor Wu]]'s palace in [[Chang'an]].
